name: postgres-storage
description: PostgreSQL storage adapter â€” implements all 8 StorageProvider sub-stores. Works with any pg-compatible driver (node-postgres, @neondatabase/serverless, @vercel/postgres, etc.)
docs: Install your preferred pg driver (e.g. `pg`, `@neondatabase/serverless`, `@vercel/postgres`). Call `createPostgresStorage({ client: pool })` where `client` has a `.query(text, params)` method. Tables are auto-created on first use. All 8 sub-stores are implemented: conversations, memory, skills, tasks, prompts, commands, crons, jobs.
